controller

Class bookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.bookController

  • public class bookController
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is responsible for everything that relates to the books it contains every action and method that is being made on the books
    Author:
    Guy Cohen, Nimrod Mendel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      bookController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addBook()
      this method display the adding book window .
      static void addBook(Book book, java.io.File pdf, java.io.File docx, java.io.File fb2)
      this method gets an instance of Book class that contains all the new book information it sends this information to the server(to the DB).
      static void changeBookInfo(Book book)
      The method gets a Book instance and compare every detail of the book in the database (for example if a certain author exists and if he is already connected to the book if he's not the method connects him
      static void chooseBook(java.lang.String bid)
      this method get a book id of the chosen book, sends a query to the DB that gets the information about the book.
      static void cooseBookForReports(java.lang.String bookName, java.lang.String ID)
      this method gets a book name and a book id , get the needed information about that book a display the reports window for that book(by opening a new RepotsGUI a put the needed componnets in it)
      static void displayMakeAReview(java.lang.String uName)
      this method gets a user name and bring from the DB all the books that this user had been ordered , puts the books information from the DB in a new orderListGUI panel's table and displays it with an option to make review about this books
      static void displayResults(java.lang.String brief, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String langu, java.lang.String keyWord, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String appendix, java.lang.String scope)
      this method get an information about the (kind of) book the user is looking for it sends a query to the DataBase get get a list of books that answers this search.
      static void displayResultsForReports(java.lang.String brief, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String langu, java.lang.String keyWord, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String appendix, java.lang.String scope)
      this method get an information about the (kind of) book the manager is looking for it sends a query to the DataBase get get a list of books that answers this search.
      static void displayUserOrders(java.lang.String uName)
      get a username , get his orders from the database and display a window with the results table or a label "no results"
      static void displayWriteReview(java.lang.String bid, java.lang.String bName)
      displayWriteReview - get a book id and a book name and display a window for writing a review about that book
      static void downloadBook(java.lang.String bid, java.lang.String format, java.lang.String bookName)
      get a book information and pass it to DBController to download the wanted file
      static void editBookinfo(Book book)
      this method gets an existing book information(it gets a Book class instance filled with the information) and replace the book's information(that had been asked to replace) in the DB
      static void removeBook(java.lang.String bid)
      removeBook - get a book id and remove it from DB the method gets an instance of String(witch is the book ID and erase the book from the database)
      static void scopeEdit()
      this method gets all the scopes names from the DB and display them in the scope edit panel
      static void searchBook()
      this method open a new userBookGUI panel and add the book search components to it and put it inside the main frame
      static void sendTheReview(java.lang.String bid, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String title)
      get a book id a review title and the review itself and adding it to the reviews table in the database
      static void updateScope(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to)
      updateScope get 2 strings and change a scope name in DB
      static boolean verifyAuthor(java.lang.String author)
      Check the existence of an author in the DB if it exists return true else false
      static boolean verifyKeyword(java.lang.String key)
      Check the existence of a Keyword in the DB if it exists return true else false
      static boolean verifyScope(java.lang.String scope)
      Check the existence of a scope in the DB if it exists return true else false

    • Constructor Detail

      • bookController

        public bookController()

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        public static void addBook()
        this method display the adding book window . it opens a new workerBookGUI panel and puts the components for adding book and inserts that panel to the main frame

      • addBook

        public static void addBook(Book book,
                           java.io.File pdf,
                           java.io.File docx,
                           java.io.File fb2)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        this method gets an instance of Book class that contains all the new book information it sends this information to the server(to the DB). it also gets 3 files that contains the book itself(3 different format) and send it also to the server
        Parameters:
        book - the book instance that contains the new book information
        pdf - a File instance with a pdf file
        docx - a File instance with a docx file
        fb2 - a File instance with a fb2 file
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • removeBook

        public static void removeBook(java.lang.String bid)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        removeBook - get a book id and remove it from DB the method gets an instance of String(witch is the book ID and erase the book from the database)
        Parameters:
        bid - the id of the book that is being removed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the book ID is not a number or not exists in the data base it gets an exception

      • searchBook

        public static void searchBook()
        this method open a new userBookGUI panel and add the book search components to it and put it inside the main frame

      • displayResults

        public static void displayResults(java.lang.String brief,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String langu,
                                  java.lang.String keyWord,
                                  java.lang.String author,
                                  java.lang.String appendix,
                                  java.lang.String scope)
        this method get an information about the (kind of) book the user is looking for it sends a query to the DataBase get get a list of books that answers this search. then it opens a userBookGUI panel and fill its results table data with the list of the books. if the are no results it display "no results" label and displays that panel on the main frame
        Parameters:
        brief - a String with the wanted book's brief
        title - a String with the wanted book's title
        langu - a String with the wanted book's brief
        keyWord - a String with the wanted book's language
        author - a String with the wanted book's author
        appendix - a String with the wanted book's appendix
        scope - a String with the wanted book's scope

      • chooseBook

        public static void chooseBook(java.lang.String bid)
        this method get a book id of the chosen book, sends a query to the DB that gets the information about the book. it opens an instance of Book class and fill it with the information from the DB then it open a new userBookGUI panel and displays the book information on it (by using displayBook method)
        Parameters:
        bid - a String instance for the book id

      • editBookinfo

        public static void editBookinfo(Book book)
        this method gets an existing book information(it gets a Book class instance filled with the information) and replace the book's information(that had been asked to replace) in the DB
        Parameters:
        book - the book's new information

      • scopeEdit

        public static void scopeEdit()
        this method gets all the scopes names from the DB and display them in the scope edit panel

      • updateScope

        public static void updateScope(java.lang.String from,
                               java.lang.String to)
        updateScope get 2 strings and change a scope name in DB
        Parameters:
        from - - the name of the scope that is being changed
        to - - the new name for the scope

      • verifyAuthor

        public static boolean verifyAuthor(java.lang.String author)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check the existence of an author in the DB if it exists return true else false
        Parameters:
        author - the authors name
        Returns:
        boolean if the author exists return true else false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • verifyScope

        public static boolean verifyScope(java.lang.String scope)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check the existence of a scope in the DB if it exists return true else false
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope name
        Returns:
        boolean if the scope exists return true else false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • verifyKeyword

        public static boolean verifyKeyword(java.lang.String key)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check the existence of a Keyword in the DB if it exists return true else false
        Parameters:
        key - the keyword
        Returns:
        boolean if the keyword exists return true else false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • changeBookInfo

        public static void changeBookInfo(Book book)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        The method gets a Book instance and compare every detail of the book in the database (for example if a certain author exists and if he is already connected to the book if he's not the method connects him
        Parameters:
        book - Book
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • displayResultsForReports

        public static void displayResultsForReports(java.lang.String brief,
                                            java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String langu,
                                            java.lang.String keyWord,
                                            java.lang.String author,
                                            java.lang.String appendix,
                                            java.lang.String scope)
        this method get an information about the (kind of) book the manager is looking for it sends a query to the DataBase get get a list of books that answers this search. then it opens a RepotsGUI panel and fill its results table data with the list of the books. if the are no results it display "no results" label and displays that panel on the main frame
        Parameters:
        brief - a String with the wanted book's brief
        title - a String with the wanted book's title
        langu - a String with the wanted book's brief
        keyWord - a String with the wanted book's language
        author - a String with the wanted book's author
        appendix - a String with the wanted book's appendix
        scope - a String with the wanted book's scope

      • cooseBookForReports

        public static void cooseBookForReports(java.lang.String bookName,
                                       java.lang.String ID)
        this method gets a book name and a book id , get the needed information about that book a display the reports window for that book(by opening a new RepotsGUI a put the needed componnets in it)
        Parameters:
        bookName - the chosen book's name
        ID - the chosen book's id

      • downloadBook

        public static void downloadBook(java.lang.String bid,
                                java.lang.String format,
                                java.lang.String bookName)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        get a book information and pass it to DBController to download the wanted file
        Parameters:
        bid - the book id (also the file's name on the server's computer)
        format - the wanted format for the book
        bookName - the wanted book name(will also be the file name in the client's computer)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • displayUserOrders

        public static void displayUserOrders(java.lang.String uName)
        get a username , get his orders from the database and display a window with the results table or a label "no results"
        Parameters:
        uName - - the username

      • displayMakeAReview

        public static void displayMakeAReview(java.lang.String uName)
        this method gets a user name and bring from the DB all the books that this user had been ordered , puts the books information from the DB in a new orderListGUI panel's table and displays it with an option to make review about this books
        Parameters:
        uName - the user name

      • displayWriteReview

        public static void displayWriteReview(java.lang.String bid,
                                      java.lang.String bName)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        displayWriteReview - get a book id and a book name and display a window for writing a review about that book
        Parameters:
        bid - - book ID
        bName - - book name
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • sendTheReview

        public static void sendTheReview(java.lang.String bid,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 java.lang.String title)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        get a book id a review title and the review itself and adding it to the reviews table in the database
        Parameters:
        bid - - book ID
        text - - the review text
        title - - the review title
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
